spec_data.Name: php-zetacomponents-console-tools
spec_data.Description:
A set of classes to do different actions with the console, also called shell.
It can render a progress bar, tables and a status bar and contains a class for
parsing command line options.

Documentation is available in the php-zetacomponents-console-tools-doc package.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 09:32:29 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
